solution_line_template: Out of his {max_children} children, {num_children_with_5} have only 5 children so the rest who have 8 ( the same number as him) are {max_children}-{num_children_with_5} = <<{max_children}-{num_children_with_5}={num_children_with_8}>>{num_children_with_8}

6 of Max's children have {grandchildren_per_8} children each for a total of {num_children_with_8}*{grandchildren_per_8} = <<{num_children_with_8}*{grandchildren_per_8}={grandchildren_from_8}>>{grandchildren_from_8} grandchildren

2 of Max's children have {grandchildren_per_5} children each for a total of {grandchildren_per_5}*{num_children_with_5} = <<{grandchildren_per_5}*{num_children_with_5}={grandchildren_from_5}>>{grandchildren_from_5} grandchildren
